name: iBoot64 Loader
author: Blackwing Intelligence
description: Binary View for loading iBoot, SecureROM, etc. firmware
longdescription: iBoot64Binja is a Binary View plugin that aids in reverse engineering iBoot related firmware. It will identify and load the binary at the intended load address for accurate analysis. Additionally, it finds and names several functions based on various heuristics. It's heavily inspired by argp's iBoot64Helper IDA loader.

installinstructions.Darwin: Copy to `~/Library/Application Support/Binary Ninja/plugins/` or use Plugin Manager
installinstructions.Windows: Copy to `%APPDATA%\Binary Ninja\plugins` or use Plugin Manager
installinstructions.Linux: Copy to `~/.binaryninja/plugins/` or use Plugin Manager
